description: Try our easy to follow Watermelon Punch recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Watermelon Punch Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, process watermelon in a food processor until finely chopped. Strain through a fine sieve into a large bowl, discarding solids. Strain sugar mixture and add to watermelon purée with Vodka Cruisers, sparkling water and ice. Pour into glasses and serve garnished with mint leaves.
